dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I'd ask a question that could potentially help identify the assassin, such as "Did anyone notice anything unusual last night?" or "Who among us has the strongest alibi for last night?"

dialogue.speaker: Alice

dialogue.speaker: Alice

dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: "Bob, I have reason to believe you were not at home last night between 10 PM and 2 AM. I would appreciate it if you could provide a more detailed and verifiable account of your activities during that time."
